What features would you like to see in a: As a consumer, I would like to see a digital banking service that is user-friendly and offers personalized insights and recommendations about my spending habits. It would be great to have an app that helps me categorize my expenses automatically and set custom budgets for different categories of expenses. Additionally, the ability to split expenses with friends and family easily would be very helpful. Lastly, it would be great to have a mobile check deposit feature.

How often do you use mobile banking serv: As a busy teacher, I use mobile banking services frequently, at least once a day.

What would make you switch to a differen: I would switch to a different digital banking service if it offered better features, was more user-friendly, and had better customer service. Additionally, if a different service offered better rewards or incentives for using their service, I would consider switching. Lastly, if my current service experienced frequent technical issues or security breaches, I would switch to a different service.

How important is it for you to have freq: As a busy teacher, I value the convenience of having frequent engagement with my credit union through their mobile app. It is important for me to be able to easily access my account information, check my balance, and make transactions on-the-go. However, I also value my privacy and do not want to be bombarded with too many notifications or messages from my credit union. So, I would say it is moderately important for me to have frequent engagement with my credit union through their mobile app.

What concerns do you have about using a: As a consumer, I have concerns about the security and privacy of my personal and financial information when using a new digital banking service. I would want to ensure that the service has strong security measures in place to protect my data from hackers and cyber attacks. Additionally, I would be concerned about any hidden fees or charges associated with using the service. Lastly, I would want to make sure that the service is reliable and has good customer service in case of any issues or questions that may arise.

On a scale of 1-10, how likely are you t: As a consumer, I would rate my likelihood of signing up for your new digital banking service as an 8 out of 10. The features and benefits of the SmartSpender app sound very appealing and would be helpful in managing my finances. However, I would want to learn more about the security measures in place and any potential fees associated with using the service before making a final decision.

What could we do to make you more likely: To make me more likely to sign up for your new digital banking service, I would appreciate if you could offer a free trial period or a promotional offer for new users. This would give me the opportunity to test out the app and its features before committing to a long-term subscription. Additionally, I would appreciate if you could provide more information on the security measures in place to protect my personal and financial information. Lastly, if you could offer a rewards program or incentives for using the app, that would be a great motivator for me to sign up.
